alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 12 at 3:25AM EST until January 13 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (12.4 to 13.2 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Suffolk, Eastern Norfolk and Eastern Plymouth Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 4 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding occurs along Morrissey Boulevard in Boston. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Boston Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 12.5 ft, Moderate 14.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.4 ft, Moderate 3.9 ft, Major 4.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/11 AM 11.4/11.9 1.3/ 1.8 0.2/ 0.8 1 None 13/12 AM 10.2/10.7 0.1/ 0.6 0.7/ 1.1 1-2 None 13/12 PM 12.8/13.3 2.7/ 3.2 1.6/ 2.0 2 Minor 14/01 AM 9.7/10.2 -0.5/ 0.0 -0.2/ 0.3 2 None 14/01 PM 10.7/11.2 0.6/ 1.1 -0.5/ 0.0 2 None Revere MLLW Categories - Minor 12.5 ft, Moderate 14.5 ft, Major 16.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.6 ft, Moderate 4.6 ft, Major 6.1 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/11 AM 11.5/12.0 1.6/ 2.0 0.2/ 0.8 1 None 13/12 AM 10.3/10.8 0.4/ 0.9 0.7/ 1.1 1-2 None 13/12 PM 13.0/13.5 3.1/ 3.6 1.5/ 2.0 2 Minor 14/01 AM 9.7/10.2 -0.2/ 0.2 -0.2/ 0.2 2 None 14/01 PM 10.9/11.4 1.0/ 1.5 -0.6/-0.1 2 None Scituate MA MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.5 ft, Major 15.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.8 ft, Moderate 3.8 ft, Major 5.8 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/11 AM 10.8/11.3 1.1/ 1.6 0.0/ 0.5 2 None 13/12 AM 9.6/10.1 -0.2/ 0.3 0.4/ 0.9 2-3 None 13/12 PM 12.2/12.7 2.5/ 3.0 1.3/ 1.8 6-7 Minor 14/01 AM 9.3/ 9.8 -0.5/ 0.0 -0.2/ 0.2 5 None 14/01 PM 10.3/10.8 0.6/ 1.1 -0.7/-0.2 4 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
